Title: Pushing Daisies
Actors: Lee Pace, Anna Friel, Chi McBride, Jim Dale
Plot: A pie-maker, with the power to bring dead people back to life, solves murder mysteries with his alive-again childhood sweetheart, a cynical private investigator, and a lovesick waitress.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 15 wins & 35 nominations.
